chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has a problem:
The battery health is at 86% while I expected much more since it was purchased in Excellent condition.

Thank you,

When the seller receives the package, they have 3 business days (5 business days for laptops and appliances) to repair or replace the product, or 2 business days to make a refund if necessary.
The customer meets the following requirements to process the return:
✔ Confirms that the device has not been opened by a third party, exposed to water, or suffered an impact or fall
✔ Confirms that all personal data has been deleted
✔ Has confirmed that they have the return label
✔ Understands that accessories and purchase receipt must be included in the return package.
✔ Understands that they have 14 days to use the return label.

Remember: Once delivered, the seller has 3 days (5 business days for laptops and appliances) to repair or replace the item and 2 days to make a refund if necessary.

Dear ecomobile

Customer requests a refund, has changed his mind, is in his withdrawal period and wants a refund.

Regards.
Paola from the Back Care Team

Hola, agente
El vendedor no puede proceder al reenvío debido al siguiente motivo:
El artículo está bloqueado por un código o patrón.
Se ha añadido más información en este mensaje: Dear Backcare,

The phone is locked with a code. Kindly assist the customer in unlocking their device or we will not be able to proceed with the refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
KW
